page.title: 11Pennar Park Holidays part 2
page.content: lots of sponsored swims,walks,dives etc.,for charity,a park and a swimming pool.They have no sandy beach hence the need for a swimming pool.Other facilities include a large ballroom,small ballroom,club,video room,pool room,snooker room,cafe,restaurant,hairdresser,baker grocer and launderette.They employ 10 permanent staff but use 50 other casual staff during the peak months.There are 100 static caravans with room for 58 tourers and some tents.Some of the static caravans are soon to be replaced by 56 flats which the management consider to be now,more popular with the public.Winter visitors come mainly from Ireland and there are 16 families in permanent residence,catered for by the ten full time staff.
